title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? (Is This a Zombie?)
synopsis: Ayumu Aikawa is a 16-year-old high school student who is tragically murdered while investigating a suspicious house. However, he soon awakens next to a strange armored girl called Eucliwood Hellscythe. She reveals herself to be a necromancer who has revived Ayumu, consequently turning him into a zombie!
related_anime: ['Kore wa Zombie desu ka?', 'Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? OVA']
